types:type.name: cars_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type cars_json = Array<{| carId: Number {"typeId": "int"}, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, origin: String, desitation: String, carType: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"carId\\\":1,\\\"price\\\":150,\\\"origin\\\":\\\"Docklands\\\",\\\"desitation\\\":\\\"Dundrum\\\",\\\"carType\\\":\\\"Prime\\\"},{\\\"carId\\\":2,\\\"price\\\":200,\\\"origin\\\":\\\"Rathmines\\\",\\\"desitation\\\":\\\"Portobello\\\",\\\"carType\\\":\\\"Sedan\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: cars_csv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type cars_csv = Array<{| carId: Number, price: Number, origin: String, desitation: String, carType: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}
